title: MTV's Laguna Beach
name: MTV's Laguna Beach
description:
A Map by Baostar

Places from the show Laguna Beach: The Real Orange County.

properties.name: Alta Laguna Park
properties.description: Posted by System 3250 Alta Laguna Blvd, Laguna Beach, CAAlta Laguna Park

properties.name: Emerald Bay
properties.description: Posted by BaostarEmerald Bay sits at the southeast corner of Crystal Cove State Park. From the overlook 600 feet above Abalone Point, Emerald Point, and Emerald Bay, are dramatic coastal vistas of Dana Point, Laguna Beach, and Newport Bay.

properties.name: Gina's Pizza and Pastaria
properties.description: Posted by Baostar 1100 S. Coast Highway #104, Laguna Beach, CA 92651A family-owned and run business for 27 years in South Orange County serving handmade pizza, homemade pasta sauces, sandwiches, salads, desserts and more. Newly expanded dining rooms. Full menu and specials available for take-out and delivery also.

properties.name: Girl In The Curl Surf Shop
properties.description: Posted by Baostar 750 S. Coast Highway, Laguna Beach, CA 92651

properties.name: Heidelberg Pastry Bistro
properties.description: Posted by Baostar 1100 S Coast Hwy, Laguna Beach 92651The Heidelberg is a casual place located right on Pacific Coast Highway. There are some indoor seats and a few outdoor tables on a patio just above the street. You will get traffic noise here, but it\'s also the perfect people-watching locale. It\'s a local favorite and packed all the time, especially for breakfast.

properties.name: Ivy Day Spa
properties.description: Posted by Baostar 1100 S. Coast Hwy #112A, Laguna Beach, CAIvy Day Spa was voted by New Beauty Magazine as a five star destination and was featured on MTV’s Laguna Beach, The Real OC. We are a complete full day spa service- skin, hair, nails with more than ten different types of advance facials, premium body care such as a healing hot stone body massage and the Alpha 2010 capsule system. Other services available-cold laser skin tag and broken capillaries removal, permanent make-up and semi eyelash extensions.

properties.name: Laguna Ave
properties.description: Posted by Baostar Laguna Ave, Laguna Beach, CA

properties.name: Laguna Beach High School
properties.description: Posted by Baostar   625 Park Ave, Laguna Beach, CAEstablished in 1934, Laguna Beach High School has an enrollment of 935 and is the only high school within Laguna Beach Unified School District. LBHS offers a strong college preparatory program. Ninety-five percent of its graduates attend two or four year colleges. LBHS is accredited by the Western Association of Schools and Colleges and was recognized as a National Blue Ribbon School in 1995 and a California Distinguished School in 1996.

properties.name: Laguna South Coast Cinemas
properties.description: Posted by Baostar  162 South Coast Highway, Laguna Beach, CA 92651Two-screen movie theater in the heart of downtown Laguna Beach. Screens new blockbusters and independent releases. Laguna Beach Film Society screens foreign/art movies here monthly. Both theaters have balconies. Street parking only. (25 cents for 15 minutes, free after 7 p.m.)

properties.name: Laguna Surf & Sport
properties.description: Posted by Baostar  1088 S. Coast Hwy, Laguna Beach, CA 92651-2964

properties.name: MTV's Laguna Beach (video clip)
properties.description: Posted by Baostar  Laguna Beach, CAA nice fan clip from youtube.com

properties.name: Main Beach
properties.description: Posted by Baostar   Broadway & PCH, Laguna Beach, CAMain Beach is a southwest-facing, busy, urban beach in the middle of downtown Laguna. This small beach attracts a lot of visitors, especially in summer. On weekends, artists and street musicians set up along the boardwalk. At night, Main Beach\'s waterfront walk is popular with strolling sweethearts.

properties.name: Meeschka
properties.description: Posted by System219 Broadway St, Laguna Beach, CAMeeschka (949) 376-2525

properties.name: Mosun Sushi - Club M
properties.description: Posted by Baostar  680 South Coast Highway, Laguna Beach CA, 92651 Laguna hot spot with sleek décor offers sushi, 25 kinds of sake, fine Pacific Rim cuisine. Trendy, well-heeled Club M upstairs.

properties.name: Muse
properties.description: Posted by Baostar 300 Forest Ave, Laguna Beach, CA 92651-2116

properties.name: Oak Street Beach
properties.description: Posted by Baostar  Oak Street and PCH, Laguna Beach, CAOak Street Beach is a very popular surf area. You will always find someone in the water here enjoying the waves that this beach offers. There are some exposed rocks on the far east side of the beach. Most of the reefs in Laguna Beach run parallel with the shore.

properties.name: Pomodoro
properties.description: Posted by Baostar 234 Forest Avenue, Laguna Beach, CAOur founder, Adriano Paganini, opened Pomodoro to give people a taste of the kind of honest, satisfying food he grew up eating in Northern Italy. We serve fresh, simple dishes with high quality ingredients.

properties.name: SURF AND SAND RESORT
properties.description: Posted by Mdonnelly1555 south coast highway laguna beach, ca

properties.description: Posted by BaostarThaila St and PCH, Laguna Beach, CA 92651Thalia Street Beach is a very popular surf area. You will always find someone in the water here enjoying the waves that this beach offers. There are some exposed rocks on the far east side of the beach. Most of the reefs in Laguna Beach run parallel with the shore.

properties.name: Thalia Street Surf Shop
properties.description: Posted by Baostar 915 S. Coast Hwy, Laguna Beach, CA 92651

properties.name: The Koffee Klatch
properties.description: Posted by Baostar  1440 So. Coast Hwy., Laguna Beach, CA 92651The Klatch offers the cushiest couches and chairs where you sit and enjoy a cup of coffee, food and desserts. It also has free Wi-Fi and and Internet kiosks built into some of the tables. The atmosphere is a dimly lit place with eclectic décor of rouge walls, sheer, flowing drapes, box-shaped couches and chairs, hanging candelabras, and framed vintage posters on the wall. Locals use Koffee Klatch as a convenient meeting place. It\'s also a hangout for the girls of the reality show "Laguna Beach: The Real Orange County," if you care about that.

properties.name: Victoria Street Beach
properties.description: Posted by Baostar  Victoria St. Laguna Beach, CA Victoria Beach is accessed from Victoria Street off of Coast Highway in Laguna Beach. From Broadway you turn east on Coast Highway heading toward south Laguna. Just Past Moss Street is Victoria Street.
